name: PROTOHELL
description:
PROTOHELL is bullet-hell survive to evolve game. You are a single-cell lipid-based protocell. You must defeat bacteria-based protocells and consume their remains to gain genetic material that you use to grow your abilities. Once you gain all abilities, your quest to become a multi-cell organism is complete. There are 5 levels of increasing difficulty.  

This game was made for the Xanderwood 3 Jam with the theme or "evolution." 

I used Construct 3, Aseprite, SFXR, and Rytmik Ultimate to make this game. All assets were made by myself. 

Please leave a comment and let me know what you think, your feedback is appreceiated.

Update 4-10-21 - a few minor bug fixes. Lowered enemy damage slightly. fixed a few glitches and things that just working as intended.
